kiCallflow.title: AI callflow
kiCallflow.pageTitle: What is an AI callflow? Definition, differences, benefits
kiCallflow.pageDescription: AI callflow: a learning conversation and process flow. Differences to classic call flows and voice agents, benefits and use.
kiCallflow.short: AI callflow: a learning conversation and process flow — understands intents, conducts dialogues, connects systems.
kiCallflow.l3: Beyond classic call flows or voice agents
kiCallflow.intro: An AI callflow is a learning conversation and process flow that understands intents, conducts dialogues and connects to your systems. It combines intent recognition, business logic, automations and integrations.
diffItems: Dynamic instead of static: understands intents and decides contextually
Multi‑step processes incl. follow‑ups, validations, hand‑offs
kiCallflow.voiceAgentsText: A voice agent is the voice. The AI callflow orchestrates the entire process incl. logic, data and actions.
terminology: Conversation Workflow / Conversation Flow||Overall flow incl. post‑call steps, not just the live call.
Call Lifecycle||Full lifecycle from call start through conversation to post‑processing.
Post‑Call Processing (PCP)||Everything after the call: analytics, cleanup, classification, triggers.
Conversational Automation Pipeline||When post‑processing is highly automated and integrated with other systems.
Contact Flow with backend integration||Contact‑center term when logic + data processing are combined.
kiCallflow.e2eDefinition: End‑to‑end means the AI callflow handles the entire conversation and process lifecycle – from the first ring to documented post‑call actions – with no manual handoffs.
e2eIncludes: Actions: bookings, tickets, orders, data writes
Post‑call processing: follow‑ups, email/SMS, CRM updates
e2eCriteria: ≥95% process completions without manual rework (per use case)
kiCallflow.note: If analytics, cleanup, data extraction and automations after the call are included, we speak of a conversation flow – it is an end‑to‑end process before, during and after the call.
benefits: Higher close rates through structured process guidance

faq.pageSubtitle: Everything you need to know about AI voice agents and phone AI
faq.description: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our AI voice agents and automated telephony. If your question isn't answered, please feel free to contact us directly.
faq.question1: What is an AI voice agent?
faq.answer1: An AI voice agent is an intelligent voice assistant based on artificial intelligence that is capable of conducting phone conversations, answering customer inquiries, and automating processes. Unlike traditional voice dialog systems, AI voice agents can conduct natural conversations, understand complex concerns, and independently offer solutions.
faq.question2: How does callflows' phone AI work?
faq.answer2: callflows' phone AI uses advanced artificial intelligence to conduct natural conversations. It understands concerns, can book appointments, provide information, and handle complex tasks - all over the phone. The AI is specifically trained on your business processes and can seamlessly integrate into your existing systems. It works around the clock and can handle multiple conversations simultaneously.
faq.question3: Which companies are AI voice agents suitable for?
faq.answer3: AI voice agents are suitable for companies of all sizes looking to make their customer communication more efficient. They are particularly suitable for customer service, sales, marketing, and HR processes. Whether small business or large corporation - the solution scales with your requirements and can be adapted to various industries.
faq.question4: What does an AI voice agent cost?
faq.answer4: The costs for an AI voice agent at callflows are based on a minute-based billing model. Prices vary depending on the package and minute volume. There are no hidden costs or basic fees - you only pay for actual usage. For individual requirements, we offer customized solutions.
faq.question5: Can an AI voice agent be integrated into existing systems?
faq.answer5: Yes, callflows' AI voice agents can seamlessly integrate into existing CRM systems, calendar systems, and other business applications to ensure smooth information exchange. Integration happens via APIs and webhooks and is fully managed by our team.
faq.question6: How natural does an AI voice agent sound?
faq.answer6: callflows' AI voice agents sound extraordinarily natural and are barely distinguishable from human conversation partners. They understand context, can respond to follow-up questions, and conduct fluid conversations. Voices are specifically selected for your brand and can be customized in tonality and speaking style.
faq.question7: How long does setting up an AI voice agent take?
faq.answer7: Setting up an AI voice agent typically takes 2-4 weeks, depending on the complexity of your requirements. The process includes analyzing your business processes, configuring the agent, integrating into your systems, and thorough testing. Our team accompanies you throughout the entire process and ensures the agent is optimally tailored to your needs.
faq.question8: Which languages do the AI voice agents support?
faq.answer8: Currently, our AI voice agents support German and English. Additional languages are planned and can be implemented upon request. Agents can also be set up multilingually and automatically detect the caller's language.
faq.answer9: Data protection has the highest priority at callflows. All data is processed in accordance with GDPR and stored on servers within the EU. We implement state-of-the-art security measures such as encryption, access controls, and regular security audits. Detailed information can be found in our privacy policy.
faq.question10: What distinguishes callflows from other providers?
faq.answer10: callflows stands out through the combination of advanced AI technology and personal support. We don't offer a standard solution, but develop a customized solution together with you that perfectly fits your company. Our AI voice agents are particularly natural in conversation and can handle complex tasks independently. We also offer a transparent pricing model with no hidden costs.
faq.answer11: To use a callflows AI voice agent, you only need an internet connection and a phone system. We support all common telephone systems (VoIP, ISDN, SIP) and can also provide cloud-based solutions. Integration happens via standardized interfaces, so no special technical knowledge is required.
faq.question12: Can the AI voice agent also handle complex inquiries?
faq.answer12: Yes, our AI voice agents are designed to handle complex and multi-step inquiries. They can store context information, ask follow-up questions when needed, and even initiate escalation processes. If an inquiry exceeds the agent's capabilities, it is seamlessly transferred to a human employee.
faq.answer13: Quality is ensured through continuous machine learning and regular optimizations. All conversations are evaluated (naturally in compliance with data protection) to improve performance. Additionally, we offer detailed analytics and reporting tools so you can monitor your AI voice agent's performance at any time.
faq.question14: Is there a test phase or pilot project?
faq.answer14: Yes, we offer a pilot month in which the system is created for you. This phase lasts 1 month. During this time, you can test the functions of our AI voice agent without obligation.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Abeln Goltz GbR ("callflows", "we", "us" or "our") operates the website https://callflows.de (hereinafter "Service"). This privacy policy informs you about our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service. We process your data exclusively in accordance with the provisions of the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) as well as applicable German data protection laws. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of your data in accordance with this privacy policy.

30165 Hannover

dataCollection.title: 2. What Data Do We Collect?
dataCollection.content:
We collect and process personal data only to the necessary extent. This includes:

• Data provided directly by the customer: Name, email address, phone number

• Data from the use of our service: Call logs, transcriptions (if activated by the customer)

• Data from initial contact: If a potential customer shows interest in our services, a video call may be conducted to discuss requirements. This conversation is recorded and deleted at the latest after 30 days or when the agent goes live. Recording only takes place with prior explicit consent from the customer.

• Automatically collected data: IP address, browser information (for website optimization), cookies

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.content:
We process personal data exclusively for the following purposes:

• Creation, provision and improvement of voice agents
• Customer communication and support
• Billing and payment processing (via Stripe)
• Ensuring and optimizing service quality
• Compliance with legal obligations

thirdParties.title: 4. Disclosure to Third Parties
thirdParties.content:
We do not share personal data with uninvolved third parties. However, we work with the following third-party providers that are necessary for providing our service:

• Synthflow AI (platform for voice agents, white-label solution)
• Stripe (payment processing)
• Hosting provider (server location within the EU)

We have corresponding data processing agreements (DPA) with these service providers to ensure GDPR compliance.

retention.title: 5. Storage Duration & Data Deletion
retention.content:
• Customer-related data is stored as long as an active contractual relationship exists.

• Upon cancellation of the subscription, all personal data will be deleted unless there is a legal retention obligation.

• If the customer consents to further storage for future offers, contact data may continue to be stored.

• Recordings from initial conversations are deleted at the latest after 30 days.

rights.title: 6. User Rights Under GDPR
rights.content:
Users have the following rights regarding their personal data:

• Right to information (Art. 15 GDPR): What data do we store?
• Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR): Correction of incorrect data
• Right to erasure (Art. 17 GDPR): Have data deleted
• Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
• Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
• Right to object to certain processing (Art. 21 GDPR)

Requests can be made at any time to info@callflows.de.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
• Our website uses cookies to improve the user experience.

• When first visiting the website, a cookie banner appears asking the user whether they consent to or decline the use of cookies.

• No personal cookies are stored or evaluated unless the user gives consent.

• If analysis tools (e.g. Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel) are used, this only happens with consent.

security.title: 8. Data Security
security.content:
We implement technical and organizational measures (TOMs) to protect personal data:

• SSL encryption for secure data transmission
• Firewall and access controls
• Password protection and two-factor authentication (2FA)
• Restricted access rights for employees
• Storage on secure servers within the EU

transfer.content: • All data is stored exclusively within the EU.\n• No transfer to third countries (e.g. USA) takes place.

agb.section6Content:
Flexible Usage & Billing:
Customers have the option to book minute packages in addition to their monthly subscription. These minute packages offer cheaper per-minute prices compared to exact minute billing.

If the customer does not book a minute package, conversation minutes exceeding the included minute quota are automatically billed at €0.99/minute on an exact-minute basis.

Validity & Usage Order:
Minute packages are unlimited in time and remain valid until they are completely consumed. The minutes are used in a fixed order: First, the minute quota included in the monthly subscription is consumed, then already booked minute packages are used. If a customer has purchased multiple minute packages, they are consumed in the order of their purchase, with the oldest packages used first.

Stacking & Transferability:
Customers have the option to buy multiple minute packages simultaneously, stack them, and consume them flexibly in any order. Unused minute packages are automatically transferred to the next month and do not expire as long as the subscription remains active.

Cancellation & Expiry of Minutes:
However, upon cancellation of the subscription, all unused minute packages expire with immediate effect. No refund is provided for unused minutes. Minute packages must always be booked manually; automatic top-up is not provided.

Price Changes & Transparency:
Prices for minute packages may change. Customers will be informed about price changes at least 30 days in advance via email or through the website. However, changes only apply to newly purchased minute packages – already bought packages retain their original conditions.

Areas of Use:
Minute packages can be used for all calls, both inbound and outbound. There are no further restrictions apart from the general terms of use of the service.
